references.reason: This book provides fundamental concepts and mathematical tools used extensively in the theoretical analysis of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Learning with local and global consistency
references.reason: This paper introduces the graph regularization framework that is adapted and extended in the proposed SEvo method.
AdamW, introduced in this paper, is the foundation for the improved optimizer used in this paper to enhance recommendation performance.
This paper introduces SASRec, a baseline model, which the proposed SEvo method is applied to improve its performance.

references.paper_title: LightGCN: Simplifying and powering graph convolution network for recommendation
references.reason: This paper introduces LightGCN, which is another baseline model compared against in the paper to showcase the effectiveness of the proposed method.
